signal

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • signal.Tone
      • signal.Square

  • public class Square
extends Tone
    Class to create square wave audio signal. It extends from Tone class
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ehsan-Ul-Haq

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Square(FreqObject dao, int waveSelection)
      Constructor of Sine class with specified user inputs e.g file name and user selection for Frequency1, Frequency2 or Sum

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generateSignal(int sample, int waveSelection)
      Method to generate audio signal on the basis of user selection and store the float values of generated signal in a buffer array of type float

      • Methods inherited from class signal.Tone

        createTone, getAudioFormat, getBuf, getFilename

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Square

        public Square(FreqObject dao,
              int waveSelection)
        Constructor of Sine class with specified user inputs e.g file name and user selection for Frequency1, Frequency2 or Sum
        Parameters:
        dao - gets the user inputs e.g filename for .wav file. If user does not enter file name, then "untited.wav" is taken by default
        waveSelection - parameter for user selection for Frequency 1, 2 or Sum

    • Method Detail

      • generateSignal

        public void generateSignal(int sample,
                           int waveSelection)
        Method to generate audio signal on the basis of user selection and store the float values of generated signal in a buffer array of type float
        Specified by:
        generateSignal in class Tone
        Parameters:
        sample - is the sample number of audio signal
        waveSelection - is the user selection for Frequency 1, 2 or Sum
